ol.title: To create a new file:

li.p: In the File Management menu group, click File List (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary). For more information about expanding and collapsing menu groups, see Menus and Navigation.

ol.li: Click Add File. The Add File window appears.
Type the name you want in the New File Name field.

Select the template you want from the Choose Template drop-down list. If you select HTML, you can format the document using common HTML code. If you select XHTML, you will format the document based in the conventions set forth by the W3C commitee on XHTML. For more information about XHTML, see http://www.w3.org/MarkUp/

Select the word wrap style you want from the Word Wrap Options drop-down list. If you select None, the content in the File Contents text box does not wrap. If you select Soft, the content in the File Contents text box does line wrap but you do not save your carriage returns. If you select Hard, the content in the File Contents text box does line wrap and you save your carriage returns.
Type the contents you want in the File Contents text box.
When you are finished, click OK. The home page appears with a message informing you that the file was successfully created.
